channel.title: delete on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in delete on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: kubernetes delete node
item.description: clear cat k8.export.sh export KUBECONFIG=$HOME/admin.conf ls k get node kubectl drain kn1 --delete-local-data --force --ignore-daemonsets kubectl delete node kn1 kubectl drain kn2 --delete-local-data --force --ignore-daemonsets kubectl delete node kn2 k get node clear kubectl drain km --delete-local-data --force --ignore-daemonsets kubeadm reset k get pod --all-namespaces docker ps
